# css-bitmap

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Description

A image component.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description          | Type     | Default     |
|----------|-----------|----------------------|----------|-------------|
| `imgSrc` | `img-src` | The path to the img  | `string` | `undefined` |
| `imgAlt` | `img-alt` | Alt text for the img | `string` | `undefined` |

----------------------------------------------

## Usage

```html

<css-button img-src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" img-alt="imagen de prueba" />
```
